articles.title: Moderna Files to Expand the Conditional Marketing Authorization for its COVID-19 Vaccine in the European Union to Include Children Ages 6-11 Years - ACROFAN USA
articles.description: Submission based on Phase 2/3 study of mRNA-1273 in children ages 6 to 11CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Moderna Inc. (Nasdaq: MRNA), a biotechnology company pioneering messenger RNA (mRNA) therapeutics and vaccines, today announced that it has submitted f…
